description:
Tune in April 2 at 10 AM PT to for the third and final Destiny 2: Into the Light! developer livestream. The Bungie team will be talking about the return of two classic Exotic missions, a preview of the three new PvP maps arriving in May, a new PvE challenge called Pantheon, and more!

#destiny2 #gaming
title: Destiny 2: Into the Light Developer Livestream #3
